org.graylog.metrics

Class GelfReporter.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graylog.metrics.GelfReporter.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    GelfReporter

    public static class GelfReporter.Builder
extends Object
    A builder for GelfReporter instances. Defaults to using 127.0.0.1:12201 via UDP as default target, using the INFO message level, converting rates to events/second, converting durations to milliseconds, and not filtering metrics.
